snippet.title: Splodey - Official Launch Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description: Explore the dangerous world of Splodey and see action-packed gameplay in this latest trailer for the upcoming 2D platformer without a jump button. Splodey is available now on Steam. Splodey is a 2D platformer that replaces the jump mechanic with explosive potions that must be used to clear obstacles and propel the player through each level. The game rewards timing, creativity, and exploration across four themed worlds.
